-  🧔🏻 I'm a `37`year old form the United States 🇩🇪
- 🌱 I’m currently learning `HTML`

- 🎉 Fun-Fact: I played semi-proffesional Hockey

## 🖥️ My exquisite laptop setup

<img align="right" height="300vh" src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55334727/233895069-d1aa1e76-3ce5-4e3d-b1ea-ee7d34bd80c2.png">
<details open>
  <summary>Machine Specs</summary>

  - CPU: AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX w/ Radeon graphics
  - GPU: Nvidia RTX 3060
  - RAM: 64GB (2x32) G.skill Ripjaws
  - Motherboard: Alienware
  - Drives:
    - Boot: M.2 2280 solid-state drive
    - Work: same
    - Game: Samsung 970 EVO PLUS NVME 2TB

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Peripherals</summary>

  - Monitor: 2x LG 30" 4K
  - Keyboard: Ducky Miya Pro Flarestar (It has Spaceships!)
  - Mousse: Logitech G604
  - Audio Equip:
    - Speakers: building some from a used soundbar
    - Microphone: 6.0mm uni-directional, voice isolating
    - Headphones: ASTRO A50

  </details>

<br><br>
